content: I have spent many days playing these two pixel soldier games! They are by far the greatest strategy games I have ever played! Thank you Jolly Pixel for informing me on how the rating system works! I definitely undertsand the game much more!
replyContent: Hi David, Thanks for the review. The victory rating is based not only on the difference in losses between you and the enemy, but also whether your losses are too high. If your losses exceed 50%, then a minor victory is often the most you can achieve. Let me know if you feel short changed by the rating system and I'll tweak the algorithm.
